name: Evokube Interactive Tool
description:
My final year project. 

I have attached the save files listed in the screenshot at the bottom of the page, you can download it and view it with the tool, enjoy your time  :)

EVOKUBE’s digital interactive tool enables children aged 5 and above to acquire new techniques to build and design their own construction toys. Children could use the tools provided to create something they like, which aids in their growth development, as well as to effectively train their brain, the ability to think of new things. After experimenting on their own in the long run, it helps develop critical thinking and foster problem-solving in children. These skills are of the utmost importance when they join the workforce in the future. Hence, the purpose of the project is to develop the children to have creative thinking and imagination.
